quote: Love may not be enough to wake a child in the morning, dress him, and get him to school, then to feed him at night, bathe him, and put him to bed. Still, can any of us imagine a childhood without it?
quote_letters: LOVE MAY NOT BE ENOUGH TO WAKE A CHILD IN THE MORNING DRESS HIM AND GET HIM TO SCHOOL THEN TO FEED HIM AT NIGHT BATHE HIM AND PUT HIM TO BED STILL CAN ANY OF US IMAGINE A CHILDHOOD WITHOUT IT
